p: Dengue patients were asked to list the signs and symptoms of dengue fever using an open-ended question. A total of 73 (75%) of them mentioned fever and 82 (85%) mentioned a headache. Other signs and symptoms were: body malaise 62 (63%), joint pain (62%), muscle pain, 26 (27%), eye pain 20 (21%) and vomiting 15 (16%). Other signs and symptoms seldom mentioned were excessive sweating, epistaxis, abdominal pain and diarrhoea.
